entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. GitHub + hexo + next主题的个人博客框架终于搭好了，折腾自己大半天，幸亏CSDN、简书等社区上有前辈们总结的经验，帮忙排了不少坑（十分感谢），不然脑子真要waht了。在这里给大家推荐一个hexo史上最全搭建教程 Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
